tool_description: API showing all the news surrounding Chelsea Football Club
title: Chelsea FC News Live

api_list.name: Get Single Source Chelsea FC News
api_list.description: This will return the Chelsea FC news from a specific source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chelsea-fc-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{sourceid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chelsea-fc-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Chelsea FC News
api_list.description: This will return all the latest news surrounding Chelsea FC.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chelsea-fc-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chelsea-fc-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
